timeline.bodyText:
I had to read this through twice to get why we had two sourceFieldMapping instanceof Map conditions.
Some refactoring for readability would be nice, but not required.
timeline.author: benwtrent

replies.bodyText: I did not have an idea on how to improve this piece of code but added comments that clarify the need for this double-checking.
